text: Hahaha… laugh out loud ridiculous!!!

Watched it & enjoyed it for what it was. Who doesnt love a Nora Roberts story? Like a smutty Hallmark film. I'm totally here for that!!!

And to be totally inappropriate... Sam Page looking mighty fine for being scruffy/casual.

Bad writing, cringey dialogue, annoying main character, questionable acting.
It tries to be more interesting than it is. It's very difficult to suspend disbelief as far as the massive conflict of interest for the lead detective goes, or the fact the chief seems to be more inclined to listen to a writer than her best detective. 
A hour and thirty-six minutes I'll never get back.
Not quite sure what most people here were expecting, but I enjoyed this for what it was. Alyssa Milano still got it! It's true 👌

Movie was flat, I found there was nothing captivating about it. Ms. Milano should look for another profession she has no acting ability. She looked sort of haggard and got a bit too frumpy to play the part of a dominatrix. Found the last 15 minutes painful to watch.

This movie throws logic out of the window. The story is badly written and does not make a lot of sense. The main character is just annoying. There was potential in the other characters but they did nothing with it. The plot could be a good movie. But this was a bad implementation.

Subpar story, lazy acting, and a movie that’s almost a parody of itself but is begging to be taken seriously. Even at 90 minutes of movie, you could’ve cut half of the movie out and ended up with the same thing.

Subpar story, lazy acting, and a movie that's almost a parody of itself but is begging to be taken seriously. Even at 90 minutes of movie, you could've cut half of the movie out and ended up with the same thing.

I believe there is a misjudgment with this movie. It delivers exactly what it is: a bland murder mystery movie. Alyssa is fantastic as ever, beautiful and empowered. The ending was a little desappointing, I hoped for more mystery...but, anyway, it is a really nice movie for what it is.
Very bad movie, not funny bad but just bad.

Una mezcla de crimen policial con película romántica de televisión. Por momentos se siente inorgánica, como que se nota mucho la diferencia entre un tono y otro. La presencia de Alyssa Milano le da una estrellita extra, el resto olvidable.

this is one of the worst movies i have ever seen in my life.  Failed on all counts.  The acting is so bad that I don't know how certain scenes were approved by the directors.  I was able to guess the final plot right from the start.  My expectations for this movie were already low, but they managed to overcome my disappointment.
Good movie. Generally interesting. People who don't like it just don't like Nora
This movie was horrible. Like a Hallmark murder mystery, but worse. The acting is atrocious, the lines are pathetic, this movie sucks.
pretty okay..........

Minha opinião: Acredito que o livro seja melhor que o filme. Interpretações superficias, ao estilo filme de categoria B. A trama se passa, quando a irmã Alyssa chama a irmã para contar oque iria fazer com seu ex-marido. Mas no dia seguinte ela aparece morta. E o vizinho da irmã é um policial com que Alyssa começa um relacionamento. E Alyssa começa a investigar a morta da irmã, mas vão aparecendo novas vitimas, até que Alyssa se faz passar no lugar da irmã que fazia show eróticos pela web. Para pegar o criminoso. Até que pegam o criminoso e termina o filme. O filme todo é superficial. Momentos que forçam o filme. 
Roteiro: o roteiro faz até sentido, porem a produção e a atuação, não ajudam.
Vale apena assistir? Não
Nota: 3
Baja hasta lo profundo de ridículo y poco interesante
Terrible acting! Especially the female acting! Cringy moments in the storyline. Painful to watch
This movie was a bionic super bad movie made by pieces of lesser movies.
Milano's still got it!
